name: Bobotie
description: Spiced minced meat baked with egg custard topping.
additionalInfo: South African classic, often served with yellow rice.

name: Snoek Braai
description: Grilled snoek fish over open fire with apricot glaze.
additionalInfo: Popular coastal dish, high in protein.

name: Biltong Salad
description: Green salad topped with slices of cured beef.

name: Boerewors Skewers
description: Grilled South African sausage on skewers with veggies.
additionalInfo: Lean sausage can be used to reduce calories.

name: Chakalaka
description: Spicy vegetable relish made with carrots, beans, and peppers.
additionalInfo: Vegan-friendly, served with meat or pap.

name: Grilled Ostrich Steak
description: Lean ostrich steak grilled and served with greens.
additionalInfo: High in protein, very lean meat.

name: Stuffed Gem Squash
description: Baked gem squash filled with spiced vegetables.

name: Waterblommetjie Bredie
description: Stew of waterblommetjies (pondweed flowers) and lamb.

name: Pap & Chakalaka
description: Maize porridge served with spicy vegetable relish.

name: Grilled Kudu
description: Lean game meat grilled with herbs.

name: Spinach & Mieliepap
description: Cornmeal porridge served with sautéed spinach.

name: Avocado & Tomato Salad
description: Fresh tomatoes and avocados with herbs.

name: Samp & Beans
description: Slow-cooked maize kernels and beans.

name: Tomato Bredie
description: Stew of lamb and tomatoes with mild spices.

name: Mini Bunny Chow
description: Small portion of hollow bread filled with spicy curry.

name: Peri-Peri Chicken
description: Spicy grilled chicken marinated in chili sauce.

name: Cape Pickled Fish
description: Fish marinated in sweet and sour curry sauce.

name: Butternut Soup
description: Creamy roasted butternut soup with mild spices.

name: Roosterkoek
description: Grilled bread rolls cooked over coals.

name: Cabbage Bredie
description: Stew made with cabbage, meat, and mild spices.

name: Grilled Warthog
description: Game meat grilled and served with greens.

name: Pumpkin Fritters
description: Baked pumpkin fritters lightly spiced.

name: Venison Stew
description: Lean game meat stewed with root vegetables.

name: Grilled Prawns
description: Prawns grilled with garlic and lemon.

name: Green Bean Salad
description: Chilled salad of green beans, onions, and dressing.

name: Ostrich Burger
description: Grilled ostrich patty on a whole-wheat bun.

name: Curried Lentils
description: Spiced lentils cooked with onions and tomatoes.

name: Marogo (Wild Spinach)
description: Sautéed wild spinach with onions and spices.
